医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
数据库对 50,000 种加工食品进行排名研究分析了 50,000 多种食品，强调了杂货店中超加工食品的主导地位及其对公共健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250114/Database-ranks-50000-processed-foods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250114/Database-ranks-50000-processed-foods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13007afa-859c-4a5a-b8fb-a0878a496927 Tue, 14 Jan 2025 12:09:00 -0500 Database ranks 50,000 processed foods
高脂肪饮食与冲动行为和大脑变化有关研究人员研究了高脂肪饮食如何改变抑制控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250114/High-fat-diet-linked-to-impulsive-behaviors-and-brain-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250114/High-fat-diet-linked-to-impulsive-behaviors-and-brain-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=286781d8-0931-423e-a470-10df29a19c9c Tue, 14 Jan 2025 11:43:00 -0500 High-fat diet linked to impulsive behaviors and brain changes
人工智能揭示关键卵泡大小以促进 IVF 成功研究人员利用可解释的人工智能来确定卵泡大小，这对于辅助受孕期间的相关下游临床结果非常重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250114/AI-reveals-key-follicle-sizes-to-boost-IVF-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250114/AI-reveals-key-follicle-sizes-to-boost-IVF-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=090eaf58-875a-4a32-a9ac-fc64d8301f86 Tue, 14 Jan 2025 11:24:00 -0500 AI reveals key follicle sizes to boost IVF success
Sapio Sciences 宣布增强化学、免疫原性、GMP 和分子生物学能力Sapio Sciences 的 24.12 版通过改进的 GMP 工作流程和分子生物学功能增强了实验室信息学，从而提高了效率和科学发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250114/Sapio-Sciences-Announces-Enhanced-Capability-for-Chemistry-Immunogenicity-GMP-and-Molecular-Biology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250114/Sapio-Sciences-Announces-Enhanced-Capability-for-Chemistry-Immunogenicity-GMP-and-Molecular-Biology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4287a10b-befb-4788-81d7-e3023e9e8919 Tue, 14 Jan 2025 10:54:00 -0500 Sapio Sciences Announces Enhanced Capabilities for Chemistry, Immunogenicity, GMP and Molecular Biology
遗传学、大脑发育和心理健康影响青少年的饮食这项研究调查了遗传学、大脑成熟和心理健康之间的相互作用，揭示了青少年饮食行为和肥胖风险的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250114/Genetics-brain-development-and-mental-health-shape-teen-eating.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250114/Genetics-brain-development-and-mental-health-shape-teen-eating.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f11a5040-ffda-409e-b230-02ccba646928 Tue, 14 Jan 2025 05:47:00 -0500 Genetics, brain development, and mental health shape teen eating
肠道微生物组动态揭示影响肠杆菌科定植的关键因素肠道微生物群分析揭示了肠杆菌科细菌的共定殖模式和潜在治疗靶点，应对全球健康挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250114/Gut-microbiome-dynamics-reveal-key-factors-influencing-Enterobacteriaceae-colonization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250114/Gut-microbiome-dynamics-reveal-key-factors-influencing-Enterobacteriaceae-colonization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cbaaedc-29b0-4b04-bb2c-b5407a507911 Tue, 14 Jan 2025 05:05:00 -0500 Gut microbiome dynamics reveal key factors influencing Enterobacteriaceae colonization
限时饮食与运动相结合：小改变，大影响研究表明，将限时饮食与锻炼相结合，可以小幅但显着地减少脂肪量和体脂百分比，同时保留无脂体重。然而，结果的可变性和较短的研究持续时间凸显了进一步研究的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Time-restricted-eating-paired-with-exercise-Small-changes-big-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Time-restricted-eating-paired-with-exercise-Small-changes-big-impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a78639a-b3fd-4d69-9038-b614fe08a37e Mon, 13 Jan 2025 23:35:00 -0500 Time-restricted eating paired with exercise: Small changes, big impact
早上喝咖啡可以降低健康风险，但全天喝咖啡并不能降低健康风险早上适量喝咖啡可能会降低全因死亡和心血管死亡风险，但全天喝咖啡并没有类似的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Morning-coffee-cuts-health-risks-but-all-day-sipping-doesne28099t.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Morning-coffee-cuts-health-risks-but-all-day-sipping-doesne28099t.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af59307e-5bf6-4b39-b3a1-f4b750801348 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 22:41:00 -0500 Morning coffee cuts health risks, but all-day sipping doesn’t
UQ 和 Vaxxas 荣获全球奖项，加速基于补丁的 mRNA 疫苗的 COVID-19澳大利亚生物工程和纳米技术研究所 (AIBN) 内的昆士兰大学 BASE 设施和总部位于布里斯班的生物技术公司 Vaxxas 宣布成为一项享有声望的全球奖项的阶段获奖者，以加速开发基于贴片的 mRNA 疫苗的 COVID-19。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/UQ-and-Vaxxas-win-global-prize-to-accelerate-patch-based-mRNA-vaccine-for-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/UQ-and-Vaxxas-win-global-prize-to-accelerate-patch-based-mRNA-vaccine-for-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31066561-0bff-4bb6-bb14-95b37f547790 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 22:26:27 -0500 UQ and Vaxxas win global prize to accelerate patch-based mRNA vaccine for COVID-19
视网膜血管指纹提供非侵入性方法来预测中风风险网上发表的研究发现，眼睛后部的光敏组织层（视网膜）上的血管“指纹”可以像传统的风险因素一样准确地预测一个人的中风风险，但不需要进行多次侵入性实验室测试。在《心》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Retina-angio-fingerprint-offers-non-guarantee-way-to-predict-中风-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Retina-angio-fingerprint-offers-non-pressive-way-to-predict-中风-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e2c9624-89b2-43fa-9e21-f8a1fc912daf Mon, 13 Jan 2025 22:20:00 -0500 Retina vascular fingerprint offers non-invasive way to predict stroke risk
